FuncDef: The display ip-pool pool-usage domain command displays the usage of the address pool of every domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a domain.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If no domain is specified, the usage of the address pool of every domain is displayed. If a domain is specified, only the usage of the address pool of the specified domain is displayed. If an address pool is bound to multiple domains, the address pool is counted once. If users go online from one domain bound to the address pool, the usage of the other domains bound to the address pool is also counted.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
